materials.raw_text:
Lithium Carbonate (Li2CO3) - 4.5 g 
 Ruthenium(IV) Oxide (RuO2) - 4.5 g 
 Zinc Oxide (ZnO) - 22.5 g

sourcing.instructions:
Lithium Carbonate can be obtained from chemical supply companies or online retailers specializing in lab chemicals. 
 Ruthenium(IV) Oxide is available from specialty metal suppliers or online chemical retailers. 
 Zinc Oxide can be sourced from pharmacies, cosmetic suppliers, or chemical supply stores.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 4.5 g of Lithium Carbonate using a precision scale. 
 2. Weigh out 4.5 g of Ruthenium(IV) Oxide. 
 3. Weigh out 22.5 g of Zinc Oxide. 
 4. In a clean, dry container, combine all three ingredients. 
 5. Use a mortar and pestle or a ball mill to thoroughly mix the powders until a uniform consistency is achieved.
